name: Phantom Haunting
description: An ancient mansion on the outskirts of town
has become haunted by vengeful spirits
that torment anyone who dares to enter.
and lay the restless spirits to rest
before they spread their influence further.

dialogs.start1: That old mansion has been trouble for decades.
dialogs.start2: Strange lights, eerie sounds, and now people are going missing.
dialogs.start3: Something must be done before the haunting spreads to town.
dialogs.progress1: The spirits are restless - their essence is particularly strong.
dialogs.progress2: You've uncovered the truth behind the family's tragic past.
dialogs.complete1: Lord Blackwood's spirit has finally found peace.
dialogs.complete2: The mansion is quiet now. The haunting has ended.
